channel.title: Prayer head icon help

item.title: Prayer head icon help
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

when I am using prayer like melee, magic, ranged, smite etcâ€¦only the melee one has the graphic symbol appear above my forehead but I can select all the prayer spells at once. Is their a way to fix this glitch?

P.S is the code below where I set the prayer icon to appear above my head??

case 21245: // Protect From Magic
if(ProtMage == false){
noprayer();
ResetProtPrayers();
NewDrain = 15;
rangeOn = 0;
meleeOn = 0;
mageOn = 1;
DrainPray = true;
ProtMage = true;
newdrain();
headIcon = 4;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}else if(ProtMage == true){
mageOn = 0;
ProtMage = false;
headIcon = 0;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

Read full topic
